Package dao

Interface UsersDAO

All Known Implementing Classes:
UsersDAOImpl
public interface UsersDAO
This is the UsersDAO interface. This interface defines how and what will be implemented by the UsersDAOImpl class.

  • Method Details

    • loginQuery

      boolean loginQuery(String userName, String password) throws SQLException
      This is the loginQuery method. This method takes in the parameters of userName and password and then compares them to the values possessed in the database. If these match, the loginQuery method then allows the user entry into the scheduler and loads the main appointments screen.
      Parameters:
      userName -
      password -
      Returns:
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • getAllUsers

      javafx.collections.ObservableList<Users> getAllUsers()
      This is the getAllUsers method. This method searches the database for any and all users, and then adds them to an observable list called 'allUsers'.
      Returns:

      int modifyUserName(String currentUserName, String newUserName, String password)
